captions.text: >>OKAY, IN THE NEXT SHOT THE DARK LORD
RAISES HIS WEAPON AND SAYS, FOOLS, IF YOU-
>>THE NEW ANIMATED CHARACTER WANTS TO SEE YOU.
ALL RIGHT GUYS IT'S THE MENTOR CHARACTER.
THE ANIMATOR'S JUST FINISHED HIM LAST WEEK.
SIR GAVIN, BUDDY, HOW'S IT GOING?
I'VE BEEN DOING SOME RESEARCH AND I'M VERY
YOU CAN PROMISE NOT TO KILL ME.

>>SO YOU PROMISE NOT TO KILL
ME?
>>GAVIN, YOU ARE A MAIN CHARACTER BUDDY.
AWESOME FIGHTER LIKE OBI-WAN OR SIRIUS BLACK-
>>OKAY, YOU KNOW ALL THOSE PEOPLE ARE DEAD, RIGHT?
BECAUSE THEY ALL SEEM TO DIE VERY WUSSY DEATHS.

LIKE FALLING OFF THE CLIFF AFTER THE BALROG
LET GO.
OR CONTRACTING MAGICAL ARM CANCER AND THEN COMMITTING
>>AW, BUT SIR GAVIN THIS IS DISNEY.
>>YOUR FATE WAS DECIDED BEFORE YOU WERE CREATED.
NOT ALL DISNEY CHARACTERS HAVE TO LOSE A PARENT.
THE MOUSE CREATETH AND THE MOUSE DESTROYETH.
SIR GAVIN'S COMING WITH US FOR HIS OWN SAFETY.
>>OH, YOU THINK HE'LL BE SAFE IN SOME ROM-COM

WE'LL FIND HIM UNCLE WALT ALWAYS GETS HIS
MAN.
I'M THE GUY WHO SAVED JAR JAR BINKS.
ALL RIGHT BOYS, LET'S HEAD OUT.
>>UM QUESTION; DO I HAVE TO LIVE WITH JAR JAR?
>>NO, WE KILLED HIM AFTER LIKE AN HOUR.

title: Disney Plans Hero's Death - Studio C
